text.normal: Carefree, purity, travel. Willingness to leap into the unknown and start anew.
text.flipped: Low energy. Inability to make balanced decisions or move forward.

text.normal: Strength, power, direction. Summoning new ideas and inspiring action.
text.flipped: Deception. Take care in where you put your trust.

text.normal: Peace, patience, balance. All will be revealed with time and intuition.
text.flipped: Vanity, instability, selfishness and deception. Withdraw from the external world to connect with your intuition.

text.normal: Motherhood, wisdom, abundance. Connect with your feminine energy.
text.flipped: Overindulgence, bareness, domineerance. Take care of yourself first so you can take care of others without resentment.

text.normal: Wealth, independence, emotional balance. Others are relying on you for stability and security.
text.flipped: Rigidity, lack of self-control, immaturity. Assess your relationship with power and the role it plays in your life.

text.normal: Mercy, compassion, orthodoxy. A need for approval and conformity.
text.flipped: Rule-breaking and rebellion. Remember that wisdom comes from within.

text.normal: Love, friendship, partnership. Enjoy the flow of love, respect and compassion.
text.flipped: Disharmony, imbalance, misalignment. Hastiness leads to unwise decisions.

text.normal: Balance positive and negative forces. Maintain focus. A long journey may be ahead...
text.flipped: Lack of control, bad habits, setbacks. It's time to do a U turn.

text.normal: Courage, influence, compassion. Use your head, not your heart.
text.flipped: Lack of self-control and confidence, cowardice. Bring balance back to your being.

text.normal: Wisdom, enlightment, healing, self-knowledge. Allow yourself to enjoy a journey of self-discovery.
text.flipped:
Loneliness, depression,
heedlessness. Dig deeper to find your true purpose.

text.normal: Fortune, power, change. A turn for the better.
text.flipped: Fickleness, a turn for the worse. Blind optimism can lead to failure.

text.normal: Fairness, truth, law. Decisions will be made - fairly.
text.flipped: Prejudice, irrationality, dishonesty. Pay attention.

text.normal: Rest, reassessment, patience. New horizons will be revealed, in time.
text.flipped: Unwillingness to compromise and sacrifice. An investment is needed before things can improve.

text.normal: Rebirth, transition, change. Let go of what's holding you back.
text.flipped: Resistance, purging, transformation. Accidents, loss of friendship, a refusal to budge.

text.normal: Continuity, synthesis, good health. Recover your flow to get things in balance.
text.flipped: Disharmony, frustration, opposition. This is a warning, get things in balance as soon as possible.

text.normal: Deviance, bondage, commercialism. Your shadow self may be holding you back.
text.flipped: Bad habits and addictions. Be strong - afflictions can be overcome.

text.normal: Radical transformation, dissolution of partnerships, structural damage.
text.flipped: Time to dig out of the rut.

text.normal: Hope, inspiration, a bright future.
text.flipped: Disappointment and incompleteness.

text.normal: Deception, shifting sands, lunacy.
text.flipped: Deceptions can be unveiled, mistakes can be corrected.

text.normal: Growth, contentment, positive energy. It could be time to expand your horizons.
text.flipped: Potential setbacks and blocked energy. Stay vigilant of important relationships.

text.normal: Transformation, soul-searching, forgiveness.
text.flipped: Indecision, delaying the inevitable, missed opportunities.

text.normal: Transcendence, liberation, completeness.
text.flipped: You are not quite there yet. Refine your vision and filter out imperfections.

text.normal: Energy, virility, fertility. Something new is about to begin.
text.flipped: If the goal isn't defined, energy and efforts will be wasted. Don't be surprised if plans don't work out.

text.normal: Boldness, strength, possibility. The world is your oyster and everything is within reach.
text.flipped: Keep your faith. Don't let others hold you back or lose heart.

text.normal: Trade, bargaining, compromise. You are negotiating from a position of strength.
text.flipped: Be sure that others are genuine, they may have a hidden agenda. You hold the advantage, although you may not know it.

text.normal: Partnership, peace, harmony. Joining forces will benefit everyone involved.
text.flipped: Results fall short of expectations. A flaw mars an otherwise perfect arrangement.

text.normal: Playing or fighting? Absence of leadership. If forces can be rallied, the struggle will prove fruitful.
text.flipped: Lack of cooperation. A difficult situation. Decision making is hard at present.

text.normal: Victory, a bonus or a reward. Your hard work has paid off.
text.flipped: An empty victory, or someone else is taking credit for your work.

text.normal: Victory, carpe diem! Despite overwhelming odds, success is assured.
text.flipped: Doubt and uncertainty. Hesitating now could result in failure.

text.normal: Pace, change, a voyage. Don't be left behind.
text.flipped: There is no I in team. If everyone goes off in different directions, nothing will be accomplished.

text.normal: This is the eye of the storm. The situation will worsen before it can improve, but you are ready for it.
text.flipped: Pay attention and beware of traps! Read the tea leaves or you'll find misfortune.

text.normal: Burn out, pressure, heaviness. Things will ease soon. Physical exercise and relaxation can help.
text.flipped: Something is working against you! It's time to act - before too much damage is done.

text.normal: Good news is on the way. Don't be shy, make your voice heard.
text.flipped: Gossip. Someone is telling tales - stop rumours while you can.

text.normal: Passion, exploration, adventure. A sign of the explorer.
text.flipped: Lack of focus, quick to anger, change of course mid-stream.

text.normal: Light, love, soothing. Tireless charity work?
text.flipped: Jealous when crossed and fickle in affections. Cannot be swayed…

text.normal: Strength, vision, leadership and action.
text.flipped: Extreme viewpoints prevent you from yielding to the opinions of others.

text.normal: Growth, prosperity, new beginnings. Anticipate something new.
text.flipped: Are you squandering resources needlessly? Be careful, money does not buy happiness.

text.normal: Don't take more than you can handle. Don't lose sight of circumstances as you try to juggle different things.
text.flipped: You appear skilled at multitasking - but are you putting on a false front? It's not as easy as it looks.

text.normal: Craftsmanship and hard work. People look up to you and admire your good example.
text.flipped: You can do better! Don't be sloppy and pay attention to detail!

text.normal: Loosen your grip on material things to help restore the flow of energy and creativity.
text.flipped: Expect delays. Obstacles stand in the way of material gain.

text.normal: Error, missed opportunities, financial trouble. Aid is at hand, all you need to do is ask.
text.flipped: The worst has passed. Hard times can be overcome.

text.normal: Philanthropy. Generosity will be rewarded and loans will be repaid.
text.flipped: Selfish behaviour, unpaid loans, bad debt.

text.normal: Patience, hard work, effort. Things will happen, but not now. More consistent effort is needed.
text.flipped: Impatience could lead to risky endeavours.

text.normal: Success can be achieved through old fashioned work. Quick to learn, you can advance your craft with conscientious effort.
text.flipped: Lack of ambition, excessive materialism, failure.

text.normal: Wisdom, knowledge and talent meet a lack of love. This is a lonely time but success, recognition, and wealth will follow.
text.flipped: Take extra care of your treasures - material and friendships. Now is the time to take up insurance.

text.normal: Safety, security, wealth. Life is full and wealth will be passed down through the generations.
text.flipped: Loss, gambling, risk. The odds are against you, don't take risks now.

text.normal: A thirst for knowledge, pursued diligently.
text.flipped: Disorder, rebellion, illogical thinking.

text.normal: Taking responsibilities seriously, you'll finish what you start.
text.flipped: Lack of imagination and follow-through, happy to let things slide…

text.normal: Abundance, sensuality, earthliness. Enjoy abundance in many areas and share it with others.
text.flipped: Keeping up appearances and neglecting responsibility.

text.normal: Success, devotion, toughness. Excellent management and good partnerships.
text.flipped: Ruthlessness and disregard for morality.

text.normal: Joy, fertility, abundance. Oh , bright beginnings!
text.flipped: Take off the rose-tinted glasses to see things as they are.

text.normal: A relationship will enter a new and important phase.
text.flipped: Open the lines of communication to avoid misunderstanding. A tumultuous relationship has too many ups and downs.

text.normal: Party time! Relax and take credit for a job well done.
text.flipped: Overindulgence. Stop taking your fortune for granted.

text.normal: Boredom, stillness, withdrawal. You may need to move through a period of stagnation.
text.flipped: Re-imergence, new possibilities and ideas. Have you adopted something new?

text.normal: "If only..." remorse over a severed partnership or unfulfilled dream.
text.flipped: The outlook is hopeful. A reunion is at hand, or perhaps an old friend will drop in.

text.normal: Nostalgia. Things will emerge from the past.
text.flipped: The future will arrive sooner than you think. Look at what lays ahead and prepare for change.

text.normal: Flights of fancy could distract you - don't build castles in the air.
text.flipped: Cut through the fluff and get to the heart of the matter. Your willpower will carry you forward.

text.normal: Don't turn your back on success by walking away from a situation just before it's completion.
text.flipped: Projects are completed successfully - you will reap the rewards of your diligence. Expect a party or festive event!

text.normal: Your wish will be granted, expect good luck.
text.flipped: Errors or obstacles stand in the way of success. Don't allow an excess of confidence to blind you to the truth.

text.normal: Fulfilment, happiness and domestic harmony.
text.flipped: Petty squabbling - don't sweat the small stuff!

text.normal: Sensitivity, thoughtfulness, loyalty. Unexpected news is on the way.
text.flipped: With lack of experience comes naivety. Are you being easily influenced or distracted?

text.normal: An invitation or proposal is on the way.
text.flipped: Things may not be what they appear. Be weary of attractive and persuasive individuals.

text.normal: Emotional intensity and reliance on intuition before intellect.
text.flipped: Beware of self-indulgent or wayward morality.

text.normal: A creative and compassionate authority that calms turbulent waters.
text.flipped: Watch out! This person is as slippery as a fish.

text.normal: Order and just rule lead to abundance and prosperity. You are headed for success.
text.flipped: Re-examine your motives. The abuse of power and throwing obstacles in the paths of others will only cause you embarrassment.

text.normal: The situation is delicately balanced. Diplomacy is required but agreement can be reached - relationships will warm up, but it will take time.
text.flipped: Someone is not telling the whole story. A lie could upset the balance. Insist on complete honesty.

text.normal: Heartbreak, adultery, infidelity. This is a warning. Make sure to communicate with loved ones and take care of health matters.
text.flipped: Confusion, disorder, errors. Setting priorities will help ease your worries.

text.normal: Recovery. It's time to take a break from life's pressures.
text.flipped: Proceed with caution. Progress will occur in small increments. A search for something lost.

text.normal: Withdrawal after conflict or a victory without peace. It's a bad time to make enemies.
text.flipped: It's an unsettling period in time. A friend may need support.

text.normal: Relief will come after a struggle, someone will soon cut you some slack. A potential sea voyage may be in store.
text.flipped: An unexpected or unwelcome proposal. The situation cannot be resolved right now.

text.normal: Your efforts will be partially successful. Perhaps it's time for a new plan. Don't let fantasies interfere with the task at hand.
text.flipped: Someone near is dispensing bad advice. Or - could you be the one who talks too much?

text.normal: A difficult situation cannot be ignored. Bad news should be faced squarely even if nothing else can be done.
text.flipped: Past events come back to haunt you. A few extra safety precautions will prevent accidents.

text.normal: This is the darkest hour before the dawn. Action is the anti-dote to worry.
text.flipped: Trust your intuition and suspicions about that certain person. Your doubts are well founded.

text.normal: Major changes are on the way and resistance is futile. A path clears itself, giving way to something new.
text.flipped: A temporary improvement or gain. A quick profit but nothing lasting.

text.normal: Perception, action, quick thinking. Spying or trouble with the authorities.
text.flipped: Powers stronger than yours are at work. It's difficult to stay one step ahead of the situation. An imposter is found out.

text.normal: Bravery, battles, skill. You rush into situations without weighing up the consequences. Your charm can get you our of scrapes.
text.flipped: You are blind to your shortcomings. Because you fall in love at first sight, you can make the wrong choices.

text.normal: Intelligence, cool, logic. Quick wits and a sharp tongue. Continuing bravely despite loss.
text.flipped: A dangerous enemy, normally rational now shows a closed mind.

text.normal: Unquestioned leadership, primed for action. Pause to weigh the situation.
text.flipped: Stirring up controversy and discord, cruelty and mean-spiritedness.
